generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings, typical of a road where vehicles drive.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the road, adjacent to the building, is designated for pedestrians and is elevated from the road.
- building: The structure on the right side of the image, with windows and commercial signage, is a building.
- fence: A white fence with orange and white stripes is visible in the background on the left side of the road.
- pole: A tall, thin vertical pole is visible on the left side of the road, near the fence.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible on both sides of the road, particularly on the left side.
- person: A man is walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A white van is visible in the center of the image, facing away from the camera.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
